workshoptitle: Access protected applications with Oracle Universal Authenticator

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always first. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download the ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Authenticate using Oracle Advanced Authentication
tutorials.description: How to authenticate using Oracle Advanced Authentication

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Prepare your system for authentication using OUA
tutorials.description: How to authenticate with MFA using OAA

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Authenticate into Windows Device, web app and desktop app using OUA
tutorials.description: How to authenticate across devices and apps using OUA

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Cleanup the Environment
tutorials.description: How to clean up resources deployed as part of the lab

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
